data.lyric:
[ti:Cudi Montage (Explicit)]
[ar:KIDS SEE GHOSTS]
[al:KIDS SEE GHOSTS (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.47]Cudi Montage (Explicit) - KIDS SEE GHOSTS
[00:01.81]Producer：Kid Cudi/Dot Da Genius/Mike Dean
[00:03.57]Kid Cudi：
[00:18.69]Find my back in the cold
[00:20.01]Trapped in another soul
[00:21.04]They can hear me holler
[00:23.00]I'm colder than the game
[00:23.85]See 'em all strapped in an' can't move and I'm sinkin' lower
[00:27.49]Heaven gonna help me
[00:28.23]'Cause I feel the world weighin' on me heavy
[00:29.68]Tryna keep it steady
[00:31.32]Ready for the mission
[00:32.02]God shine your love on me
[00:33.97]Save me please
[00:36.28]If I'm goin' alone
[00:36.94]I've been gone for so long
[00:38.06]Ain't nobody you can't hear a word
[00:40.39]Perched in the night
[00:41.27]Lookin' out nowhere
[00:42.27]Where's home on this hidden earth
[00:45.03]Pain in my eyes
[00:45.60]In the time I find
[00:46.46]I'm stronger than I ever was
[00:48.58]Here we go again
[00:49.30]God shine your love on me
[00:51.35]Save me please
[00:52.47]Mr. Hudson/Kid Cudi：
[00:53.38]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[00:56.16]Stay strong
[00:57.58]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[01:00.57]Stay strong
[01:02.18]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[01:04.96]Save me Lord
[01:06.47]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[01:09.24]Stay strong
[01:10.97]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[01:13.61]Save me Lord
[01:15.41]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[01:17.70]Stay strong
[01:19.47]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[01:22.34]Save me Lord
[01:23.99]Hmm mm mm woah woah
[01:26.46]Kanye West：
[01:28.24]Everybody want world peace
[01:29.84]'Til your niece get shot in the dome-piece
[01:32.74]Then you go and buy your own piece
[01:34.50]Hopin' it'll help you find your own peace
[01:36.77]Bring light to what they don't see
[01:38.82]Auntie cryin' on the concrete
[01:40.97]Talkin' to dispatcher then the phone beep
[01:43.15]On the other line was the homies
[01:45.50]Told her that you ain't comin' home see
[01:47.50]When she heard the news it hurt her bone-deep
[01:49.76]Caught with the rifle with the long reach
[01:51.83]Just another cycle of the lonely
[01:53.96]All growin' up in environment
[01:56.36]Where doin' crime the requirement
[01:58.42]They send us off to prison for retirement
[02:00.53]Hopefully Alice Johnson will inspire men
[02:02.33]Mr. Hudson/Kid Cudi/Kanye West：
[02:03.82]God shine your love on me
[02:05.37]Save me please
[02:06.62]Stay strong
[02:08.16]Lord shine your light on me
[02:09.93]Save me please
[02:11.12]Stay strong
[02:12.43]Lord shine your light on me
[02:14.27]Save me please
[02:14.99]Save me Lord
[02:16.78]Lord shine your light on me
[02:18.64]Save me please
[02:19.72]Stay strong

[02:23.06]Save me please
[02:23.84]Save me Lord
[02:25.52]Lord shine your light on me
[02:27.33]Save me please
[02:28.39]Stay strong

[02:31.52]Save me please
[02:32.35]Save me Lord

[02:40.36]Save me please
[02:41.39]Stay strong
[02:42.92]Lord shine your light on me
[02:44.77]Save me please
[02:45.55]Stay strong
[02:46.23]Kanye West/Kid Cudi/Mr. Hudson：
[02:47.69]Both sides lose somebody
[02:49.83]Save me Lord
[02:50.41]Somebody dies
[02:51.35]Somebody goes to jail
[02:52.76]Woah woah
[02:53.96]Stay strong
[02:56.99]Light on me
[02:57.97]Save me please
[02:58.84]Stay strong
[03:00.37]Lord shine your light on me
[03:02.19]Save me please

[03:11.62]Stay strong
data.trans:
[ti:Cudi Montage (Explicit)]
[ar:KIDS SEE GHOSTS]
[al:KIDS SEE GHOSTS (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.47]//
[00:01.81]//
[00:03.57]//
[00:18.69]我感到后背冰凉
[00:20.01]我被另一个灵魂困住了
[00:21.04]他们能听见我的吼叫
[00:23.00]我比这游戏还要冷
[00:23.85]我看到他们被紧紧束缚 无法动弹 而我不断下沉
[00:27.49]上天会来帮我
[00:28.23]因为我感觉整个世界都压在我的身上 好沉重
[00:29.68]我想稳住心态
[00:31.32]时刻准备好执行任务
[00:32.02]上帝啊 把你的爱播撒在我的身上吧
[00:33.97]请你拯救我
[00:36.28]如果我要独自前行
[00:36.94]我已经走了这么远
[00:38.06]荒无人烟 什么也听不见
[00:40.39]我栖息在夜里
[00:41.27]眺望着不知何处
[00:42.27]在这看不见的土地上 哪里才是家
[00:45.03]我眼中充满苦痛
[00:45.60]这段时间让我发现
[00:46.46]自己前所未有的强大
[00:48.58]我们再来一次
[00:49.30]上帝啊 把你的爱播撒在我的身上吧
[00:51.35]请你拯救我
[00:52.47]//
[00:53.38]////
[00:56.16]要永远坚强
[00:57.58]//
[01:00.57]要永远坚强
[01:02.18]//
[01:04.96]主啊 请拯救我
[01:06.47]//
[01:09.24]要永远坚强
[01:10.97]//
[01:13.61]主啊 请拯救我
[01:15.41]//
[01:17.70]要永远坚强
[01:19.47]//
[01:22.34]主啊 请拯救我
[01:23.99]//
[01:26.46]//
[01:28.24]谁都想要世界和平
[01:29.84]后来在这虚伪的和平中 你的侄女被枪击了
[01:32.74]接着你就给自己买了一把枪
[01:34.50]期盼着它能让你找回宁静
[01:36.77]让光明照耀别人看不见的地方
[01:38.82]你姑妈抱着墓碑哭泣
[01:40.97]你正和调度员说着话 电话响起了
[01:43.15]打电话的是你的妻子
[01:45.50]你告诉她你今天不回家了
[01:47.50]她听到这话 心痛不已
[01:49.76]你端着步枪被抓了
[01:51.83]又要面临孤独的牢狱日子
[01:53.96]大家都生长在这个环境
[01:56.36]犯罪都是不得已
[01:58.42]他们把我们送进监狱 反而就像退休一般轻松
[02:00.53]希望爱丽丝·约翰逊的事情能让大家有点启发
[02:02.33]//
[02:03.82]上帝啊 把你的爱播撒在我的身上吧
[02:05.37]请你拯救我
[02:06.62]要永远坚强
[02:08.16]主啊 把你的光芒播撒在我的身上吧
[02:09.93]请你拯救我
[02:11.12]要永远坚强
[02:12.43]主啊 把你的光芒播撒在我的身上吧
[02:14.27]请你拯救我
[02:14.99]主啊 请拯救我
[02:16.78]主啊 把你的光芒播撒在我的身上吧
[02:18.64]请你拯救我
[02:19.72]要永远坚强
[02:21.13]主啊 把你的光芒播撒在我的身上吧
[02:23.06]请你拯救我
[02:23.84]主啊 请拯救我
[02:25.52]主啊 把你的光芒播撒在我的身上吧
[02:27.33]请你拯救我

[02:29.87]主啊 把你的光芒播撒在我的身上吧

[02:40.36]请你拯救我

[02:44.77]请你拯救我
[02:45.55]要永远坚强

[02:47.69]双方都失去了挚爱
[02:49.83]主啊 请拯救我
[02:50.41]有人死了
[02:51.35]有人进了牢房
[02:52.76]//
[02:53.96]要永远坚强

[02:57.97]请你拯救我
